snippet: Nigeria’s military rescued 234 more girls and women from a Boko Haram forest stronghold in the country’s northeast, according to a Twitter message from the Nigerian Defense Headquarters.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria’s military rescued 234 more girls and women from a Boko Haram forest stronghold in the country’s northeast, according to a Twitter message from the Nigerian Defense Headquarters.

headline.main: Nigeria: More Rescues From Boko Haram Reported
